SEO.title: About
SEO.description: I'm a freelance developer and designer who utilizes the JAMstack to make blazing fast and highly scalable react websites.
SEO.keywords: Roland Branten, Eindhoven, web developer, web designer

FirstText.firstText: A Eindhoven based developer/designer who loves to create things that he would have deemed out of his capabilities yesterday. Next to that, I'm really passionate about music. You probably care more about the first category, so let's just continue with that!

Text.text: I spend the majority of my time on the very thing your looking at right now, trying to develop memorable projects on the web. The reason I chose this route is because I love the creative aspect of design combined with the complexity of programming. Next to that, self-employment has always been something that resonates with me.

Next to simply enjoying the work, I also look forward to working together with other driven individuals/teams. There is always a huge sense of fullfilment in helping others with the achievement of their own plans and goals.
Oh and I'll just save you the trouble, I don't have any social media besides LinkedIn. No I have nothing to hide! I just function better without the thumbs up and likes.
